entry.title: Wednesday: Flurries. Temperature falling to minus 5 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Flurries ending late this afternoon then cloudy. Blowing snow over exposed areas. Local amount 2 cm. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming northwest 40 gusting to 60 except gusting to 80 along exposed areas of the coast early this afternoon. Temperature falling to minus 5 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 14 this afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NDT Wednesday 5 April 2023
